translate.key.hotel.online.review.page.same.review: What kind of reviews are collapsed?

We display the most relevant reviews based on check-in times and high quality content. Unhelpful reviews that fall into categories such as the ones below are collapsed or moved to the back of the list:
1. Similar reviews made by the same user
2. Multiple reviews made by one user for the same hotel in a short period of time
4. A large amount of positive/negative reviews for one hotel made by multiple users in a short period of time

translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.title1: Can I submit a price match request?
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.para1: At Trip.com, our goal is to provide our users with the best possible room rates. If a lower price for the same room type and the same dates is bookable on any Applicable Platform (as defined below), you may submit a request for a refund of the difference in Trip Coins. If your request meets the specified criteria and is approved, we'll send the approved refund in Trip Coins to your Trip.com account.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.step2: Find a lower price on an Applicable Platform
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.step3.detail: Submit a request that includes proof of the price difference by midnight (11:59 PM, property's local time) the day before your check-in date
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.step4.detail: We'll review your request and let you know if we've approved it within 24 hours of submission
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.step5.detail: After approval, your Trip.com account will be credited the amount in the form of Trip Coins within 1 working day after you complete your stay. No refunds will be issued for cancelled bookings.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.title4: Can I submit a price match request?
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.conditon1.det: The room type on the Applicable Platform must match your booking. It must be the same room type at the same property, with the same facilities, room size, breakfast policy, cancellation policy, number of guests, payment method, and any other applicable details.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.conditon2.det: Your stay dates entered in your request must exactly match your booking on Trip.com. Your payment method and the language you used to book must also be the same.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.conditon3.det: The lower price found on the Applicable Platform must be available to all users. It can't be a price with restrictions, limitations, or promotions (including but not limited to the use of vouchers, promo codes, loyalty point reward programs, credit card promotions, and any other method which reduces the original price shown on the Applicable  Platform).
The lower price on the Applicable Platform must be able to be booked individually. It can't be booked as part of a package, such as a tour or a flight and hotel package.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.title5: Why can't I submit a price match request?
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.unmatch1: Your booking isn't confirmed or has been cancelled
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.unmatch1.deta: Price match requests can't be submitted for bookings that haven't been confirmed yet or have been cancelled
The following booking types aren't eligible for a price match request:
Bookings you've received additional Trip Coins for
Bookings that are part of the PointPLUS program
Bookings that weren't made individually on the Applicable Platform or Trip.com, such as an add-on package or flight-and-hotel package
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.unmatch3.deta: You can only submit price match requests for prices found on the property's official website and Applicable Platforms. The term "Applicable Platform" refers to: %1$s.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum1: After you submit a request that meets all requirements and upload proof, we will review the price. If there is a discrepancy between the price you found and the price we find during verification, the current price at the time of verification will apply. After submitting your request, we'll get back to you with the results within 24 hours.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum2: The maximum refundable price difference is USD 1,500 per booking. For bookings in other currencies, the equivalent amount is calculated using the exchange rate at the time of your request.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum3: The currency used for price comparison depends on your payment method. If you pay online, we'll compare the prices in the currency used at that time. If you pay at the property, we'll compare the prices in the property's local currency.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum4: In cases where promo codes have been applied to a Trip.com property booking, the discounted price (including tax) will be used for price comparison purposes
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum5: If you modify your booking after submitting the price match request (including but not limited to changes to the property name, room type, stay dates, or number of guests), your request will be considered invalid
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum6: When submitting price match requests, you can only receive one refund per booking. If multiple requests are approved, you’ll receive a refund for the largest price difference.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum7: Please don't submit multiple requests for the same booking too frequently. We reserve the right to limit or reject requests if they appear excessive.
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum8: If price match is used in an illegal, fraudulent, abusive, or otherwise improper manner, we reserve the right to restrict requests or deny refunds
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum9: Price match is currently in trial phase and is only available in certain languages and regions
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum10: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to determine whether a booking qualifies for the price match. This decision may be based on factors including compliance with booking consistency requirements and whether the price match request meets all applicable terms and conditions (for example, our general Terms & Conditions).
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum11: The issuance, use, and validity of Trip Coins are subject to our Trip.com Rewards Program Terms and Conditions
translate.key.88801001.hotel.wpm.tcs.sum12: Where the original English version of these terms has been translated into other languages, the English version shall prevail in the event of any inconsistences between the versions

translate.key.hotel.brg.all.content: At Trip.com, our goal is to provide our users with the best possible room rates. If you find a lower price for the same room type and the same dates on another platform, you can request for us to refund the difference. Once your request has been approved, we'll send you the refund in Trip Coins.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.howto.title: Submit your claim
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.howto.time: Please submit your claim before 12:00 noon (hotel's local time) the day before your check-in date by selecting "We Price Match" on the Trip.com booking details page.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.howto.info: Please follow the instructions on Trip.com to provide price-related details, screenshots, and web address where you found the cheaper price.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.howto.attention1: Claims can only be made for confirmed bookings that have not been cancelled. Please note that the Trip.com Price Match claim submission entrance will not display if claims cannot be made for your booking.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.howto.attention2: Please ensure that the web address you provide will still be valid at the time it is checked, and that the cheaper price you submit will still be available to book at that time.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.howto.attention3: Please provide screenshots of the platform where you found the cheaper price. These screenshots should clearly show the hotel name, room type, check-in and check-out dates, the room price, and any other details related to your claim.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.standard.title: Review Criteria
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.standard.same.room1: The room type for your Trip.com Match Price Guarantee claim must match the room type in your booking. The room type must also be at the same hotel, and the following details must also be the same: whether breakfast is included, bed type, whether Wi-Fi is provided, room size, payment method, number of guests, change and cancellation policy, booking terms and conditions, deposit policy (if applicable), free gifts included, and any other applicable room details.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.standard.same.book1: The check-in and check-out dates for your Trip.com Price Match Guarantee claim must match the check-in and check-out dates of your booking. The device you use to book, the selected currency, and the selected language must also be the same.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.inapplicable.price1: The lower price you found must be available to all users; restricted or member-only prices are not eligible.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.inapplicable.price2: The lower price you found cannot be the price after promo codes or any other website promotions have been applied.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.inapplicable.price3: The lower price you found must be available to book independently. It cannot be a price which is only available when booked with other products, such as part of a tour group, or as part of a flight + hotel package booking.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.inapplicable.book1: Not applicable to room types offering additional Trip Coins rewards.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.inapplicable.book2: Not applicable to bookings which are part of the PointsPlus programme.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.comparison.range1: The Trip.com Price Match Guarantee is applicable to prices displayed on hotel official websites and the following hotel booking websites: Agoda, Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com, KAYAK, lastminute.com, Orbitz, and Priceline. If the lower price you found is not available on one of these websites, the Trip.com Price Match Guarantee will not apply.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.title: Important Notes
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content1: The maximum price difference that can be refunded is US$1,500 or the equivalent amount in other currencies (the exchange rate at the time you submitted your claim will apply).
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content2: The currency we use when comparing prices will depend on the payment method. For bookings that are prepaid online, we will use the currency the prepayment is made in for price comparison. For bookings that are paid at the hotel, we will use the local currency at the hotel's location for price comparison.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content3: If you applied promo codes to your Trip.com hotel booking, we will use the Trip.com price (including tax) after any promo codes were applied to compare prices.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content4: Only one Price Match Guarantee claim can be approved per booking.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content5: If you submit a booking change request after your price difference claim is approved by Trip.com, you will not be able to receive the price difference refund.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content6: The Trip.com Price Match Guarantee is currently in the trial stage, and is only available on some of the Trip.com language websites. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
translate.key.hotel.brg.terms.attention.content7: Trip.com reserves the right to exercise its discretion regarding whether the Trip.com Price Match Guarantee is applicable. This includes, but is not limited to, deciding whether or not the lower price matches the Trip.com booking in terms of hotel, room type, dates of stay, and whether or not the price difference claim meets all applicable terms and conditions.

positiveDirection.content: Great location near the airport and excellent service.
The room was very clean, and the restaurant was also good.

sectionList.desc: Nestled only two kilometers away from the Mumbai International Airport, Hilton Garden Inn creates a positively appealing environment, promising exceptional stays for business and leisure travelers alike. Featuring generous rooms and a commitment to personalized, brighthearted hospitality, the hotel seamlessly blends relaxation, comfort and productivity. Our brilliantly designed amenities and elevated extras reflect the idea of thoughtful and bright experiences - one stay at a time.

hotelDescriptionInfo.description: Nestled only two kilometers away from the Mumbai International Airport, Hilton Garden Inn creates a positively appealing environment, promising exceptional stays for business and leisure travelers alike. Featuring generous rooms and a commitment to personalized, brighthearted hospitality, the hotel seamlessly blends relaxation, comfort and productivity. Our brilliantly designed amenities and elevated extras reflect the idea of thoughtful and bright experiences - one stay at a time.

content.description: Children of all ages are welcome at this property.
Additional fees may be charged for children using existing beds. Add the number of children to get a more accurate price.
For all room types, cots can be added, but extra beds cannot be added.
Fees for cots are not included in the total price. For details, please contact the hotel.
Additional breakfast fees are not included in the total and need to be paid at the property.
The main guest checking in must be at least 18 years old

guestInfo.ageLimit: The main guest checking in must be at least 18 years old

commentList.content:
Amazing stay, very friendly staff and prompt with requests. They helped us throughout, even with booking the cabs etc! 

Cheers to the team!

commentList.translatedContent:
Environment: Since it's a newly opened hotel, the environment is exceptionally good. It's very close to the airport, about 1.9 km away, and a tuk-tuk ride costs around 100 rupees.

Service: The service in India is excellent, really top-notch overall.

Hygiene: The hygiene conditions are also superb, very clean, and the breakfast is delicious. I think it's very good.
commentList.content:
環境：因為是新開的酒店，所以説環境特別好。離機場很近，1.9公里左右，突突車100多塊錢。


服務：印度的服務特別好，整體都特別好。

衞生：衞生條件也特別好，非常乾淨，早餐特別好吃。我覺得很不錯。

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is about a 20-minute drive from the airport. The room size was standard, but due to recent renovations, there was a smell and poor soundproofing. On the plus side, the hot water in the bathroom was quick, and breakfast was decent.
commentList.content: 酒店離機場開車大概20分鐘，房間正常大小，由於新裝修的原因，有味道，隔音不好，衞生間出熱水很快，早餐也不錯

commentList.translatedContent: Great location near the airport and excellent service.
commentList.content: موقع قريب من المطار وخدمه راقيه

I stayed at this hotel during a recent business trip and had a very smooth and comfortable experience. The check-in process was efficient, and the staff were professional and attentive. The room was clean, quiet, and well-equipped with everything needed for work, including stable Wi-Fi and a comfortable workspace. Overall, an excellent choice for business travel. I would not hesitate to stay here again for future work trips.
Nice ambience, nice room. Music a bit too loud at common area.

We decided to book a staycation with a runaway facing room since our son loves aeroplanes. The room overall was on point and the view did not disappoint. The breakfast buffet was average and since we stayed just one night, can't comment on variability of dishes. The terrace pool was clean and well maintained, however not large in size. Since there were only 2 groups of 2 guests using the pool, there was no issues. All in all, it was worth the value.

Newly built Hotel, so very clean and comfortable 
Stayed for a week 
The breakfast is also excellent 
Staff are very friendly and helpful 
I would recommend it for sure 
I will definitely stay here again
commentList.roomTypeName: Deluxe Twin Room With City View

commentList.content:
Excellent service





I recently stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Mumbai, and my overall experience was expressly good. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, welcoming, and professional, making check-in smooth and hassle-free.

The room was clean, well-maintained, and offered all the comforts you’d expect from a Hilton property

commentRating.ratingCalculationContent: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.

Deluxe King Room With Runway View

aiSummaryEntities.excitationText: This property hasn't received any negative reviews in the past 2 months.

summaryItemList.title: Location
summaryItemList.conclusion: The hotel is conveniently located near the international airport, making it an ideal choice for travelers. It's about a 5-20 minute drive from the airport, with easy access to public transportation like tuk-tuks and the metro, making city exploration convenient.(based on 23 reviews)

summaryItemList.title: Service Quality
summaryItemList.conclusion: Guests frequently praised the hotel's service, describing the staff as friendly, professional, and attentive. Many noted the smooth check-in process and the staff's readiness to assist with various requests, enhancing the overall experience.(based on 13 reviews)

summaryItemList.title: Cleanliness and Hygiene
summaryItemList.conclusion: The hotel is newly built, ensuring a clean and well-maintained environment. Guests appreciated the cleanliness of the rooms and common areas, mentioning that hygiene standards were high, contributing to a comfortable stay.(based on 18 reviews)

summaryItemList.title: Breakfast
summaryItemList.conclusion: Breakfast received mixed reviews, but many guests found it to be decent with a good variety of options. The breakfast service was generally well-received, contributing positively to the overall stay experience.(based on 10 reviews)

summaryItemList.title: Guest Suggestion
summaryItemList.conclusion: Some customers suggest improvements in communication about internet outages and ensuring a sufficient breakfast supply, as these issues were repeatedly mentioned.(based on 1 review)

crumbs.text: Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport

list.title: What is the nearby landmark for Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport?
list.answer: Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport is at the prime location of Mumbai. The nearby landmarks include Hungry Minds, and it is 430m from your search (straight-line distance).

list.title: What are the check-in and check-out timings at Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport?
list.answer:
The check-in time at Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport is 15:00 and the check-out time is 12:00.
You can request the property for early check-in or late check-out by directly reaching out to Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport.

list.title: How to get from the closest airport to Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport?
list.answer: The closest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, and it is about 25 mins from hotel on foot (1.8 km).

list.title: Does Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport offer airport transfer services?
list.answer: Yes, Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport offers airport transportation for guests. We suggest you call ahead to confirm details.

list.title: Does Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport have a swimming pool?
list.answer: Yes, Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport has a pool.

list.title: What are the check-in and check-out times at Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport? Is early check-in and late check-out available?
list.answer: Prices at Hilton Garden Inn Mumbai International Airport are subject to change according to dates, hotel policy, and other factors. To view prices, please search for the dates you wish to stay at the hotel.
